[{"id":"045ccebb-2bed-4488-a78a-95a0971e290e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: class_hiearchy","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5fdf879e-19fa-4cfb-a360-dd1bd23c4fb1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class_hiearchy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs the FASTEN class hierarchy (CHA) representation by linking each class in the analyzed package to its parent classes. It encodes inheritance relationships using either internal namespace identifiers or external FASTEN URIs, depending on where parent classes are defined.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"58648d5c-c934-42bf-9ffa-d883a15b800b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function translates Python’s method resolution order (MRO) information into a standardized hierarchy format suitable for cross-language and cross-project analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f952f64-8575-4d87-bc66-e4135354b79e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"6c73b41b-9457-46d4-9054-8bef022881d5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class_hiearchy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to capture structural inheritance relationships within the analyzed codebase and between the codebase and its external dependencies. This hierarchy enables reasoning about polymorphism, inheritance depth, and dependency inheritance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6dbf3569-cef7-41a2-96aa-ebde4496287c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"56edc791-6d19-49b3-98cf-f6a34e89f898","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed invoked, the function performs the following URIs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6f0ccc2-6f09-47e6-8273-03f9c0033328","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ddc29353-1303-4fc3-a67d-269e1d5dcab1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1054b9c5-5896-42f7-a119-7190729d5799","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class_hiearchy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides the inheritance dimension of the FASTEN output. Alongside module definitions and call graphs, it enables deeper structural analysis of object-oriented relationships within and beyond the analyzed package.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae07daec-dc75-40fa-b938-66ffec40c3da","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ee3f8efb-081c-4d47-9912-861464560b06","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1cc404cb-4948-4830-b36b-3afba582c34b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accurately reflects Python’s inheritance semantics via MRO","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b93dc02a-5d3b-4e19-8214-8981fb81eca4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Maintains a clear distinction between internal and external classes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b9364337-8c03-402f-b4f8-c78f4cd6f69a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reuses existing URI and namespace resolution logic","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"61c474c0-e0bf-4f88-9b34-c5f9069cd305","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Produces a schema-compliant and analysis-ready hierarchy structure","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"769d6655-545f-4085-ae73-4335939d66d6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e8029ea7-3c03-4e5e-bdca-0373c2cc9e67","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
